TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A type of lymphoma that tends to grow and spread slowly, and has few symptoms. Also called low-grade lymphoma.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "linfoma de crecimiento lento"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Tipo de linfoma que tiende a crecer y diseminarse lentamente, y que presenta pocos síntomas. También se llama linfoma de grado bajo.
